step number three take asymmetrical bets with

up money you should take on asymmetrical bets if

an asymmetrical bet is a bet that has limited 
downside with almost unlimited upside which

basically means that it's a bet that has a decent 
chance of paying off extraordinarily high returns

the key part here is a decent chance of paying off 
you see people who play the lottery are not taking

asymmetrical bets because although they have the 
chance to win millions their chances of winning

is less than 1 in 10 million an example of a real 
asymmetrical bet is something like ethereum right

after the march 2020 crash you see ethereum had 
an established network it was seeing an increase

in adoption at exponentially higher rates and it 
was also significantly down from its all-time high

i figured that considering all of these things

15x return yes the potential gains of investing in

only a 15x compared to a 1 million x but the

hundreds of thousands of times higher 500 000
